title: Laptop City
description: Laptop City is a laptop reselling website. It is a MERN project. I have used HTML,CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase. Laptop city was about a refurbished Laptop reselling website.
detail1: Laptop City sales refurbished laptops around the world.
detail2: There can be 3 types of user in this suite.While registering by default users will be give buyers role option, or they can choose seller role.
detail3: Users with buyer role can purchase products and pay for its. Stripe is used for payment integration.
detail4: JWT is used which will expire in 1 day (If the data doest not load that means yours JWT token has expired, so if you ever face such problems just log out and login again)
detail5: Admin can see all types of users including sellers and buyers.Admin can verify sellers and also can delete them.

title: Nikah Photography
description: Nikah photography is a personal service app for wedding photographers. It is a MERN Stack project. I have used HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase.
detail1: This is a personal photography service app. In this app users can check out my services and add review
detail2: In this app My services and Add review pages are protected, unless user is signed in, they can't view the content or use the functionalities of those pages.
detail3: In this app user can sign in by Google and by using email. User must register first with email and password if he/she wish to sign in using email.
detail4: User can check all the reviews users have give from My reviews page. Users can delete or update the the review text, user picture and user name.
detail5: In this app if user is logged in, user can add services from add services page , and give review of the services from service details page.

title: Epic Coding
description: Epic Coding is an online education platform . It is a MERN Stack project. I have used HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase.Users can select any of the courses from available courses.
detail1: This is an online education platform app focused to Technology Development
detail2: In this app there are bunch of courses from which users can select their desired course..Users can see the name of instructor, ratings, picture and many more details.
detail3: In this app the checkout page is protected, unless the user is signedIn, user can not view content of checkout page.Checkout page will contain details about the course user purchased
detail4: User can now reset their password by clicking forget password. User can view their password while typing now for both login and register form.
detail5: In userProfile page user can change display name and profile picture.After changing users name, user profile user should reload the page to see the updated data.This is small bug, I am still working on it.

title: Donation - X
description: Donation - X  is an online donation platform . It is a MERN Stack project. I have used HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase.Users can select any type of events from  available events.
detail1: This is an donation event app focused on different types of Donation events
detail2: In this app there are bunch of events from which users can select an event.Users can see details of the event, what time this event was posted
detail3: In order to see about a donation user must be signed in first
detail4: In donation details page users can select the event. Only admin can update a event
detail5: If users select an event, it will appear in selected events page, from there user can delete the event selected by the user.
